title: The Fake Saintess Awaits Her Exit - Novel Updates
tags: European Ambience   Female Protagonist   First-time Interc**rse   Knights   Magic   Multiple POV   Polyandry   R-18   Reverse Harem   Saints   Transmigration
author: 백설홍
description:
I transmigrated into a book I read before dying.
Into the body of the corrupted Saintess, Yvelina, who bullied the heroine, Iris.

Yvelina is destined to burn at the stake in two years.

I can't die like this.

Wouldn't I be able to survive if I worked hard to fix my mistakes and create amicable relationships with the male leads who drive Yvelina to death?

But things didn't go my way, and Yvelina, who is the owner of the body, put out unreasonable conditions, saying I should do as I'm told if I wish to stay in her body.

Sometimes it was out of my own will, and other times it wasn't, but I tried to survive by forming relationships with the male leads of the story...

***

I know it well.
Everyone is treating me well because I'm the 'saintess'.
So when the moment when I'm no longer the Saintess comes, all these relationships will end.>
